divs: Sighting Detailshovering over buildings facing south austin looking toward downtown. appeared to have a pulsating or rotating light white, blue, red.. but colors hard to make out. very much resembled a star and mostly hovered. was moving however too fast to be a star. it had moved about 3-4 degrees further away westward in the sky and further away south. the light went from very bright to more and more faint and smaller harder to make out.
Summary: hovering over buildings facing south austin toward down town. appeared to have a pulsating or rotating light white, blue, red.. but colors hard to make out. very much resembled a star and mostly hovered. was moving however too fast to be a star.
